TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMessageReceiver implements class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Core.IReceiverClient, class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.IClientEntity
type IMessageReceiver = interface interface IReceiverClient interface IClientEntity

Docs.summary: The MessageReceiver can be used to receive messages from Queues and Subscriptions and acknowledge them.
Docs.remarks: The MessageReceiver provides advanced functionality that is not found in the or . For instance, , which allows you to receive messages on demand, but also requires you to manually renew locks using .

Docs.param: The properties of the message to modify while deferring the message.
Docs.summary: Indicates that the receiver wants to defer the processing for the message.
Docs.remarks: A lock token can be found in , only when is set to . In order to receive this message again in the future, you will need to save the and receive it using . Deferring messages does not impact message's expiration, meaning that deferred messages can still expire. This operation can only be performed on messages that were received by this receiver.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Message> PeekAsync ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Message> PeekAsync() cil managed
Public Function PeekAsync () As Task(Of Message)
abstract member PeekAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Message>

Docs.summary: Fetches the next active message without changing the state of the receiver or the message source.
Docs.returns: The that represents the next message to be read. Returns null when nothing to peek.
Docs.remarks: The first call to fetches the first active message for this receiver. Each subsequent call fetches the subsequent message in the entity. Unlike a received messaged, peeked message will not have lock token associated with it, and hence it cannot be Completed/Abandoned/Deferred/Deadlettered/Renewed. Also, unlike , this method will fetch even Deferred messages (but not Deadlettered message)

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task RenewLockAsync (Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Message message);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task RenewLockAsync(class Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Message message) cil managed
Public Function RenewLockAsync (message As Message) As Task
abstract member RenewLockAsync : Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.Message -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.summary: Renews the lock on the message. The lock will be renewed based on the setting specified on the queue.
Docs.remarks: When a message is received in mode, the message is locked on the server for this receiver instance for a duration as specified during the Queue/Subscription creation (LockDuration). If processing of the message requires longer than this duration, the lock needs to be renewed. For each renewal, it resets the time the message is locked by the LockDuration set on the Entity.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<DateTime> RenewLockAsync (string lockToken);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<valuetype System.DateTime> RenewLockAsync(string lockToken) cil managed
Public Function RenewLockAsync (lockToken As String) As Task(Of DateTime)
abstract member RenewLockAsync : string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<DateTime>

Docs.param: Lock token associated with the message.
Docs.summary: Renews the lock on the message. The lock will be renewed based on the setting specified on the queue. New lock token expiry date and time in UTC format.
Docs.remarks: When a message is received in mode, the message is locked on the server for this receiver instance for a duration as specified during the Queue/Subscription creation (LockDuration). If processing of the message requires longer than this duration, the lock needs to be renewed. For each renewal, it resets the time the message is locked by the LockDuration set on the Entity.
